name: Hazumi and the Pregnation
description:
After mass infertility strikes the globe, a new community is created with the goal to save our species. Their solution? SEX! Now the young and inexperienced Hazumi leaves her old life behind to aid in the repopulation effort. Of course, she must learn how to live in a land where common sense is seemingly flipped on its head.


  • Fully Playable Prostitution Action – Most sexual encounters are fully interactive. Players may select from a variety of techniques, and have complete control of every action. Satisfy your partner for a bigger payout.

  • Grow as a Person – Hazumi’s stats can be viewed through her smartphone. Raise her sensitivity through sexual acts, or increase charm by redecorating and remodeling Hazumi’s apartment.

  • Comprehensive Pregnancy Mechanic – Hazumi’s body will actively change as a result of pregnancy. In addition to her belly growing each trimester, she will also experience things such as morning sickness, darkening nipples, lactation, and postpartum period. Sexual encounters can also be affected.

  • Detailed Menstrual Cycle – The chance of getting pregnant will depend on the current phase of Hazumi’s menstrual cycle. She will even have her period.

  • Play at Your Own Pace – There aren’t any silly things like combat or falling in love to worry about. Some content, such as birth scenes, and x-ray view, can enabled or disabled via an in-game menu.

*The Steam Edition supports PCs.
The Android version is not included.

Developer: Mihiraghi
Artist: Taji
English Translation: Feunski
Store page design: Kurige Yoshitaka
